page.title: 08The Street Market
page.content: The street market is held in Cheshire Street and High Street every Wednesday.The people on the market get ready to set off between 3am and 6am to get to the town and set up their stall for 8am and they finish between 3pm and 5pm .The rent on the market is Â£5.50 per pitch. Some traders said that they started because of a family connection,some families had been connected with the market over 80 years, other traders said they wanted their own business or had been made redundant.To some it was only a hobby.34 stalls employed helpers. 40% of stalls sell things to wear, 11% of the stalls sell food, 14% of the stalls sell fabric, 14% of the stalls sell house hold goods,
